en.title: [2024] Children
en.description: Annual selection of key statistics on children, covering population, health, education, child protection, and juvenile crime.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest annual data on children, covering the population of children, child health, education, child protection, and juvenile crime.

bm.title: [2024] Kanak-Kanak
bm.description: Statistik tahunan mengenai kanak-kanak, merangkumi penduduk, kesihatan, pendidikan, perlindungan, dan jenayah juvana.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan data tahunan terkini mengenai kanak-kanak, merangkumi penduduk, kesihatan, pendidikan, perlindungan, dan jenayah juvana.
